properties.name: omop-bridge.cdm.database-name
properties.description: Name of the database containing CDM data.

properties.name: omop-bridge.person-conversion.mode
properties.description: Defines if persons are created automatically and without an mapping (automatic) or using OMOCL configs (conversion).

properties.name: omop-bridge.eras-period-cron.enabled
properties.description: Sets cron job for eras and periods, default is false.

properties.name: omop-bridge.eras-period-cron.cron
properties.description: Definition how of the cron is to be executed.
